mapper.select: select count(*) from stock_vi where stk_id = #{stk_id} and to_date(stk_daye,'YY/MM/DD') =(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)
select count(*) from stock_vi where stk_id = #{stk_id} and stk_rel= #{stk_rel} and to_date(stk_daye,'YY/MM/DD') =(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)
select count(*) from stock_news where news_company =#{news_company} and news_href = #{news_href}
select * from stock_news where replace(news_company,' ','') LIKE #{stk_nm}
mapper.update: update stock_vi set stk_rel = #{stk_rel} where stk_id = #{stk_id} and stk_nm = #{stk_nm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_vi (stk_id, stk_cd, stk_nm, stk_pri, stk_inc, stk_act, stk_rel) VALUES (#{stk_id}, #{stk_cd}, #{stk_nm}, #{stk_pri}, #{stk_inc},#{stk_act}, #{stk_rel})
insert into stock_news(news_company, news_title, news_href, news_time) values (#{news_company}, #{news_title}, #{news_href}, #{news_time})
